article_title: Scandal-scarred Cardinal Keith O’Brien renounces ‘rights and privileges’ of his office
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) When Pope Benedict XVI accepted O'Brien's resignation, O'Brien admitted "there have been times that my sexual conduct has fallen below the standards expected of me as a priest, archbishop and cardinal.”

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Ethics, Institutions, Cardinal Keith O'Brien, Catholic, Christian, clergy sex abuse, College of Cardinals, Pope Francis, Vatican
